title: Rate law of NO2 from conc natural log inverse data

content.question: Which of the following rate laws is consistent with the data?

choices.label: <math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of N O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mrow><mtext>N</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of N O 2, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mrow><mtext>N</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mtext>]</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k times the fraction 1 over the molar concentration of N O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mtext>N</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k times the fraction 1 over the molar concentration of N O 2, squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mtext>N</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Rate equals k times the molar concentration of N O 2, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mrow><mtext>N</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mtext>]</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
